relation: Teachers are knowledgeable and the campus is well organized. Very good for biology and natural resources. Has a book renting system which saves a lot of money.
pageTitle: University of Wisconsin-Stevens Point (UW-Stevens Point) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {298497=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 126039=The DeBot Dining Center has an all-you-can-eat cafeteria as well as a convenience store in the basement of the building. Throughout the year, the dining center incorporates theme days into the menu. In 2012, students were treated to Harry Potter night, Caribbean Carnival dinner, and Chocolate Madness., 98123=Great Accounting degree program with a great Business department.Awesome professors that have real work experience where the homework problems don't have a year end December 31. Great sports programs from golf, volleyball, basketball, and our great baseball where we have a couple of past players in the majors.}

textAfterTable: Bang for the buck UWSP has lots of free events you can attend with you point card. There's also rental books rather than buying your books. A BIG PLUS! Everything else is fair price. Am enjoying being here The people on campus are very friendly and welcoming. There's lots of things you can do that are on campus. When you do have questions, so many people are willing to help you. The Financial Aid and Bursar's office are so helpful when you have a problem. Am learning a lot The professors here, really want to help you. They know how to teach in a fun way. Login to rate or flag the reviews Oralia from Burr Ridge, IL 01/17/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 9 out of 9 people found this review useful. 2 of 69 Categories Comments Great for these types of students The
